dictionary:
Launched as a grenade. It detonates when it contacts the ground, covering it with flaming mixture.
Expells a stream of a burning napalm, which smolders on the ground for some time, burning the enemy.
Strikes with bombs that deal minor damage and ignite the ground.
A heavy anvil drops at target point, pushing a victim into ground and destroying lying objects. The anvil also stays on a ground, preventing enemy from getting out.
Great weapon to trap an enemy, if he doesn't have turn switch or emergency teleport. Anvil's ability to break ground while falling can be used to push enemies down to water.
Device that can be attached to any surface, which disables common healing methods for your enemy. Doesn't affect most bosses and rabbit regeneration. If an enemy destroys the blocker, he gets considerable damage. Lasts for 6 turns.
Heal blocker should be used to counter enemy, who relies too much on medkits and regeneration. Use it, when an enemy digs under the ground to heal. Make sure enemy can't destroy the blocker with mines, try to attach it to high walls or ceiling.
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Device which can be attached to any surface to damage nearby enemies that stay in the air for too long. Stays for 10 turns, increasing its radius every turn. Doesn't spend a turn.
Greatly disturbs enemy who relies on flying devices.
Paraiste is thrown like a normal grenade, but it latches to enemy instead of exploding. On the next turn parasite will slow its victim and then explode in 10 seconds.
Parasite damage isn't the greatest, but its main purpose is to trouble your opponent on his next turn. Keep in mind that your enemy may use the turn switch to avoid the effect of the parasite.
Laser beam easily cuts through both ground and your enemies! The beam can be controlled by up/down keys.
Laser can be as great for drowning as for damage. It can push even frozen enemies to the water.
The most powerful strike, it drives an enemy into the ground, taking 35% of his current hitpoints and burying him in the ground. Increased battering depth.
The most powerful strike, it drives an enemy to depression, taking the 35% of their current hit points and burying him in the ground, also reducing attack and armor by 20% for 2 turns.
A unit attacked by this weapon, is sent flying with a very high speed. If target unit hits the ground, it destroys a small amount of landmass and takes damage.
Gas grenade emits a cloud on explosion, which deals cold damage to all units it covers at the end of a turn. Also slows targets for 1 turn. Cloud damage can't be dodged. Lasts for 4 turns.
This mine can be put under the enemy and it tosses him up in 3 seconds, so you can attack him in midair. Doesn't deal damage and doesn't waste a turn.
Really shines in combination with pushing weapons. Feel free to experiment!
Your units are protected from slowing caused by ice shards. Try to slow as much enemies as you can by throwing the orb with the maximum power.
Releases swarm of hungry spirits towards a target. Spirits pick random ally or enemy unit and rush through the ground to it. Damage of spirits increases, if the weapon user is wounded. If a spirit doesn't find a target, it attacks the user!
Just aim towards an enemy and shoot. Make sure there are no allies in the area of effect. If the enemy is too far, your soldier gets all the damage!
Restores 75hp to allies standing nearby. Bag user's healing bonus improves the effect. Doesn't heal the user himself! Doesn't waste a turn.
The bag is especially great if you manage to target several allies.
